name: mousecase
description: Mousecase is a JavaScript utility supporting touch-like horizontal scrolling with a mouse!

scripts.chore:delete-changelog-branch: if git show-ref --quiet refs/heads/chore-changelog; then git branch -D chore-changelog; fi
scripts.chore:setup-next-work: git checkout master && npm run chore:delete-changelog-branch
scripts.chore:pr: git add . && git commit -m '[chore] updates changelog' --no-verify && git push origin chore-changelog -f
scripts.chore: npm run chore:delete-changelog-branch && npm run chore:branch && npm run chore:changelog && npm run chore:pr && npm run chore:setup-next-work
scripts.prepush: npm run build && npm test && npm run eslint && npm run prettier
scripts.postpublish: git tag $npm_package_version && git push origin --tags && npm run chore
